data.message: Idk if everyone has just run out of shit to talk about or what but here's my 2cents. First off Em, Budden, anyone in Slaughter House are real hardcore lyricists. Drake is in the Timberlake/Bieber category and can rap. Eminem is and will be a legend. Does that mean he's the best? No. There is no fucking best it is all about your taste your preference what style  scratches that itch for you.
